verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu aatma priyudaa ninnu naashrayinchiti Levagaa darangamul gaali vaana kottagaa jeeva Baadhalannitan nannu daachu rakshakaa nannu Nadpi revunan aatma jerchu meethudan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dikkuleni yaatmaku vere praapu ledika Nontigaanu vidvaka nannu yaadarinchu mee Ninne nammi yuntini neeve naa sahaayamu Kaapuleni naa thalan needu rekka krammanee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristu ninu gorudun dorku nanni nee kadan Padda heenu neththu mee swastaparchu rogulan Nyaaya shudda naamamu neede nenu paapini Nenu paapa poornudan neevu prema roopivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapa mella maanpagaa needu prema chaalunu Maanpu neellu naa yedan shuddi cheyagaa nimmu Neevu jeeva ootavu thraaga nimmu nee darin Putti naadu naatmalo nella vela paarumee{/lang-eng}
